title: "Homework"

1. Go through the [Managing a project](projects.qmd) page and video
2. Create a new quarto website
    - You can just use the `index.qmd` file for this exercise
3. Import our Skittles data (link TK) using `read_csv()`
4. Find the answers to the following questions:
    - Who got the most candy? Who the least?
    - What is the average number of candies per bag?
    - On average, which color candy is most prevalent?
